languages.text: "Если ты так беспокоишься о моем мире, элантах, почему не отправил{mf|ся|ась} искать ответы со мной? Быть может, тогда Эклендиль остался бы жив". {n}Глаза {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарки{/g} вспыхивают недобрым огнем, а бледные губы вытягиваются в тонкую линию.{/n} "Я нашла его умирающим в тисках очередного орудия пыток. И Эклендиль раскрыл мне печальную судьбу нашего мира".

traits.locale_text: "Если ты так беспокоишься о моем мире, элантах, почему не отправил{mf|ся|ась} искать ответы со мной? Быть может, тогда Эклендиль остался бы жив". {n}Глаза {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдарки{/g} вспыхивают недобрым огнем, а бледные губы вытягиваются в тонкую линию.{/n} "Я нашла его умирающим в тисках очередного орудия пыток. И Эклендиль раскрыл мне печальную судьбу нашего мира".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you not go seeking answers by my side? If you had, Eklendyl might have survived." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found him dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And Eklendyl revealed the sad fate of our world to me."
languages.original_text: "Если ты так беспокоишься о моем мире, элантах, почему не отправил{mf|ся|ась} искать ответы со мной? И Эклендиль раскрыл мне печальную судьбу нашего мира".

traits.locale_text: "If you are so worried about my world, elantach, why hadn't you gone to look for the answers by my side? Eklendyl might have survived then." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} woman's eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found him dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And Eklendyl revealed the sad fate of our world to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “如果你真的如此在乎我的世界，外界人，你当时为什么没有陪在我身边一起寻找答案？如果你也在，埃克伦迪本可能会活下来。”{n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的眼中露出了凶光，她苍白的嘴唇抿成了一条窄线。{/n}“我在酷刑台上找到了他，那时他已奄奄一息。他向我揭示了我们的世界悲惨的结局。”
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you not go seeking answers by my side? If you had, Eklendyl might have survived." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found him dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And Eklendyl revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: “如果你真的如此在乎我的世界，外界人，你当时为什么没有陪在我身边一起寻找答案？如果你也在，埃克伦迪本可能会活下来。”{n}这位{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}的眼中露出了凶光，她苍白的嘴唇抿成了一条窄线。{/n}“我在酷刑台上找到了他，那时他已奄奄一息。他向我揭示了我们的世界悲惨的结局。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you not go seeking answers by my side? If you had, Eklendyl might have survived." {n}The Aeldari's eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found him dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And Eklendyl revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

languages.text: «Si tanto te preocupa mi mundo, elantach, ¿por qué no me has acompañado en busca de respuestas? De haberlo hecho, Eklendyl podría haber sobrevivido». {n}Los ojos de la {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} relucen con una amenaza y sus labios pálidos forman una delgada línea.{/n} «Lo encontré moribundo, atrapado en otro dispositivo de tortura. Y Eklendyl me reveló el triste destino de nuestro mundo».
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you not go seeking answers by my side? If you had, Eklendyl might have survived." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found him dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And Eklendyl revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: «Si tanto te preocupa mi mundo, elantach, ¿por qué no me has acompañado en busca de respuestas? De haberlo hecho, Eklendyl podría haber sobrevivido». {n}Los ojos de la {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} relucen con una amenaza y sus labios pálidos forman una delgada línea.{/n} «Lo encontré moribundo, atrapado en otro dispositivo de tortura. Y Eklendyl me reveló el triste destino de nuestro mundo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、我の惑星をそんなに心配しているのなら、なぜ我のそばで答えを探しに行かなかったのだ？そうしていれば、エクレンディルは生き延びたかもしれないのに」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の目が威嚇するように光り、青白い唇が細い筋を描く。{/n}「我は彼が別の拷問器具に抱かれて死んでいるのを見つけた。そしてエクレンディルは我らの惑星の悲しい運命を明かしたのだ」
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you not go seeking answers by my side? If you had, Eklendyl might have survived." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found him dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And Eklendyl revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、我の惑星をそんなに心配しているのなら、なぜ我のそばで答えを探しに行かなかったのだ？そうしていれば、エクレンディルは生き延びたかもしれないのに」{n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}の目が威嚇するように光り、青白い唇が細い筋を描く。{/n}「我は彼が別の拷問器具に抱かれて死んでいるのを見つけた。そしてエクレンディルは我らの惑星の悲しい運命を明かしたのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr Euch so um meine Welt sorgt, Elantach, warum habt Ihr nicht an meiner Seite nach Antworten gesucht? Hättet Ihr das getan, hätte Eklendyl möglicherweise überlebt." {n}Die Augen der {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} blitzen bedrohlich auf und ihre fahlen Lippen verzerren sich zu einem dünnen Strich.{/n} "Ich fand ihn sterbend in der Umarmung eines weiteren Folterwerkzeugs vor. Und Eklendyl offenbarte mir das traurige Schicksal unserer Welt."
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you not go seeking answers by my side? If you had, Eklendyl might have survived." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found him dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And Eklendyl revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr Euch so um meine Welt sorgt, Elantach, warum habt Ihr nicht an meiner Seite nach Antworten gesucht? Hättet Ihr das getan, hätte Eklendyl möglicherweise überlebt." {n}Die Augen der {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} blitzen bedrohlich auf und ihre fahlen Lippen verzerren sich zu einem dünnen Strich.{/n} "Ich fand ihn sterbend in der Umarmung eines weiteren Folterwerkzeugs vor. Und Eklendyl offenbarte mir das traurige Schicksal unserer Welt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Si vous vous préoccupez réellement de mon monde, elantach, pourquoi ne m'avez-vous pas accompagnée dans ma quête de réponses ? Eklendyl aurait peut-être survécu si vous aviez été là. » {n}L'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} s'interrompt et serre les lèvres, une lueur menaçante dans les yeux.{/n} « Je l'ai trouvé à l'agonie dans l'étreinte d'une autre machine de torture, et il m'a révélé le triste sort de notre monde. »
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you not go seeking answers by my side? If you had, Eklendyl might have survived." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found him dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And Eklendyl revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous vous préoccupez réellement de mon monde, elantach, pourquoi ne m'avez-vous pas accompagnée dans ma quête de réponses ? Eklendyl aurait peut-être survécu si vous aviez été là. » {n}L'{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g} s'interrompt et serre les lèvres, une lueur menaçante dans les yeux.{/n} « Je l'ai trouvé à l'agonie dans l'étreinte d'une autre machine de torture, et il m'a révélé le triste sort de notre monde. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, dünyam için bu kadar endişeleniyorsan neden cevapların peşine birlikte düşmedik? Düşseydik belki Eklendyl yitmezdi." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari'nin{/g} gözlerinden tehditkâr bir bakış saçılıyor, solgun dudaklarıysa ince bir çizgi hâlini alıyor.{/n} "Onu bir işkence cihazıyla sarmalanmış vaziyette, ölümle burun buruna buldum. Eklendyl, benimle dünyamızın hüzünlü kaderini paylaştı."
languages.original_text: "If you are so concerned for my world, elantach, why did you not go seeking answers by my side? If you had, Eklendyl might have survived." {n}The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'s eyes light up menacingly and her pale lips stretch into a narrow line.{/n} "I found him dying in the embrace of yet another torture device. And Eklendyl revealed the sad fate of our world to me."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, dünyam için bu kadar endişeleniyorsan neden cevapların peşine birlikte düşmedik? Düşseydik belki Eklendyl kurtulurdu." {n}{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}'nin gözlerine tehditkâr bir bakış yayılıyor. Solgun dudaklarıysa ince bir çizgi hâlini alıyor.{/n} "Onu bir işkence cihazıyla sarmalanmış bir hâlde, ölümle burun buruna buldum. Eklendyl, benimle dünyamızın hüzünlü kaderini paylaştı."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
